name: proctorplus
description: an ai proctored skill assessment and evaluation system

scripts.download: start cmd /k "cd frontend && npm install && npm run dev" && start cmd /k "cd proctorplus && pip install -r requirements.txt && python manage.py runserver"
scripts.start: start cmd /k "cd frontend && npm run dev"   && start cmd /k "cd  proctorplus   &&python manage.py runserver "
